chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
B: lattice
s: Pred (A -> B)
p: A -> B

Goal:
(forall q : A -> B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> fun_sup s <== p

Premises:
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
fun_sup = fun (s : Pred (A -> B)) (x : A) => sup [Pred p | exists f : A -> B, f \In s /\ p = f x] : Pred (A -> B) -> A -> B
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
pair_supM : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), (forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p
fun_supP : forall (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), p \In s -> p <== fun_sup s
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
pair_supP : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), p \In s -> p <== pair_sup s
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [A : Type B : lattice s : Pred (A -> B) p : A -> B |- Type] ?T' : [A : Type B : lattice s : Pred (A -> B) p : A -> B |- Type] ?f : [A : Type B : lattice s : Pred (A -> B) p : A -> B |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [A : Type B : lattice s : Pred (A -> B) p : A -> B |- ?T'] ?s : [A : Type B : lattice s : Pred (A -> B) p : A -> B |- seq ?T]
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
subp_orr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> PredU q p1 <=p PredU q p2
subp_orl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> PredU p1 q <=p PredU p2 q
Image' : forall A B : Type, Pred A -> (A -> B) -> Pred B
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
image_spec_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : SProp), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
image_spec_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : Prop), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
subp_andr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => q x /\ p1 x) <=p (fun x : T => q x /\ p2 x)
subp_andl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => p1 x /\ q x) <=p (fun x : T => p2 x /\ q x)
Im_mem : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (a : A), b = f a -> a \In P -> image_spec P f b
pair_sup : forall A B : lattice, Pred (A * B) -> A * B
subp_or : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p q /\ p2 <=p q < -> PredU p1 p2 <=p q
dfun_leq : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset), (forall x : A, B x) -> (forall x : A, B x) -> Prop
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Image_mem : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (P : Pred A) (x : A), x \In P -> f x \In [Image f i | i <- P]
comp = fun (A B C : Type) (f : B -> A) (g : C -> B) (x : C) => f (g x) : forall A B C : Type, (B -> A) -> (C -> B) -> C -> A Arguments comp {A B C}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _ /
fun_leq : forall (A : Type) (B : poset), (A -> B) -> (A -> B) -> Prop
subp_and : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), q <=p p1 /\ q <=p p2 < -> q <=p (fun x : T => p1 x /\ p2 x)
sub_supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (C : sup_closed s) (u : Pred (subPoset s)) (x : subPoset s), (forall y : subPoset s, y \In u -> y <== x) -> sub_sup C u <== x
BinIntDef.Z.div = fun a b : BinNums.Z => let (q, _) := BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl a b in q : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.div (_ _)%Z_scope
sub_sup : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> Pred (subPoset s) -> subPoset s
@sval : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
